summary: Such a dainty name for multiple use take down arrow. Ok I guess I should tell you all this lol, I gave the arrow name Iron Butterfly because of the band called "Iron Butterfly". ;)
descriptionHtml:
This is replaces the Iron Arrow. It can light up your way in dark places and has 100 take down power. Wait DON'T leave check out my other arrows.Â 

Oh, and I should warn you.. These arrows can be used against you as well. Wait DON'T leave check out my other arrows, and a few other mods I made.
